price: Доћи ће Судњи час, у то нема сумње, али већина људи не верује.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: inna al-sāʿata laātiyatun lā rayba fīhā walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yu'minūna
